TopicTitle: Bill, I told you not to touch that button...

Articles.Content: I just want to say that this is an awesome game.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

I\'ve had many a 'landing' like that one. Stinking Bill *loves* the self-destruct button for some reason.

See you in orbit!

Welcome to the Kerbal Space Program Forums, ItchyFlea.

Nice landing, now how to get them back? =P

Nice landing, now how to get them back? =P

Well, we tried sending some rescue missions. The first group missed the moon altogether, and we aren\'t really sure where they are now. The second group said something about the moon getting bigger and bigger really quickly before the transmission cut out. We\'re not sure what happened to them either. Nor can we figure out where that new crater came from.
I like the look of terror on all 3 of the little green men. Now are they terrified of the impact forces, or the fact that they will all die very slowly

You managed to freak Jeb out!

Is that how you win the game? Haha
